title: Topic 003 Question 008
body: A new regulatory requirement states that all documents containing a patent ID be labeled, retained for 10 years, and then deleted. The policy used to apply the retention settings must never be disabled or deleted by anyone.
You need to implement the regulatory requirement.
Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order. (Choose three.)
